message: Let's start with a reasonable split. I get $60, you get $40. This gives us both a decent share.
I think we should split it closer to 50/50, but I'm willing to compromise a bit.
Bob, time is running out and the value keeps decreasing.  I'll take a little less this round, but we need to settle this soon.
I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's settle this before the value drops further.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'll meet you in the middle, but this is my final offer.
I know the value is dropping, but I still think 50/50 is fair. I'll give you one more chance to accept before I start making lower offers.
Okay Bob, you win. 50/50 it is. Let's just finalize this before we both lose more.
